1.text: Wipe the entire machine with soapy water.

2.text: Remove and wash the bottom reservoir.

3.text: Soak the water tank in soapy water.

4.text: Let the bottom reservoir and tank air dry.

5.text: Pull out the pod holder from the top.

6.text: Separate the funnel from the pod holder.

7.text: Poke a paper clip through the tube on the pod holder.

8.text: Rinse the pod holder and funnel under warm water.

9.text: Clean the inside of the needle with your paper clip.

10.text: Put the pod holder back in your machine.

11.text: Run 2 water-only cycles through your machine.

12.text: Empty the water tank and remove the filter.

13.text: Mix equal parts descaling solution and water in the tank.

14.text: Run the Keurig until the “Add Water” light blinks.

15.text: Let your Keurig sit for at least 30 minutes.

16.text: Fill the tank with clean water.

17.text: Run through water-only cycles on your Keurig at least 12 times.

18.text: Soak a new filter in water for 5 minutes.

19.text: Pull out the filter tube from your water tank.

20.text: Take apart the bottom of the tube to remove the old filter.

21.text: Rinse the new filter in water for 1 minute.

22.text: Place the new filter in the tube and put it back in the tank.
